<html><body><div><div class="mx-auto mb-6 px-4 md:px-0 text-lg font-normal leading-8 text-gray-800"><p class="Paragraph_wrapper__6w7GG">"The injuries inflicted upon her were of a type that the first responders who attended the scene, the paramedics, had never seen before," the court documents stated.<strong></strong><a href="https://www.canberratimes.com.au/story/9170621/heidi-robinson-sworn-in-as-the-acts-10th-magistrate/" target="_blank"></a></p></div></div></body></html>
